name: fh-mbaas-api

scripts.test:
cd node_modules/fh-security; npm install ursa; cd -; listing=$(ls -1 test/test_*); teststorun=$(echo $listing | tr -d '
'); whiskey --tests "$teststorun" --global-setup-teardown "test/setup.js"
